name: John Cornelius
title: Project Manager – Infrastructure, Supply Chain & Operations
summary: Operations and project leader with 15+ years delivering multi‑site infrastructure, supply chain, and manufacturing programs up to $48M. Aligns stakeholders, vendors, and operators to improve safety, throughput, and DIFOT while reducing cost and cycle time. Hands‑on with SAP/ERP, SCADA, and analytics (Power BI/SQL); Lean Six Sigma and TPM driven.

Own scope, schedule, and budgets; manage risk registers and vendor performance with structured cadences.
Deploy SCADA/BI dashboards for throughput, downtime, and safety metrics; drive root‑cause improvements.
achievements: Raised plant throughput by 12% while reducing overtime costs 22% via Lean/TPM programs.
Improved DIFOT by 15% and sustained >99.5% inventory accuracy through S&OP and logistics optimization.
Achieved 600+ days lost‑time injury‑free; zero OSHA PSM findings in external audits.
Negotiated supplier/freight terms yielding $2.3M+ savings while increasing delivery reliability.
